Monday – Thursday

4 Hour …………………….. $450.00  
8 Hour …………………….. $1,100.00  
Each additional hour … $150.00

Friday – Sunday

4 Hour …………………….. $1,200.00  
8 Hour …………………….. $2,200.00  
Each additional hour … $300.00

Security **Deposit** and **Additional Fees**:  
**Security Deposit: $1,000.00****Police Security Fee: Amount is determined by the officer’s hourly rate at the time of the event, per hour of rental (4 hours minimum), per officer, in** **cash****. Current rate is** **$50.00-$****75.00** ***rate subject*** **to** ***change.***

**Welcome to City of Lumberton, Texas**
=======================================

![city of lumberton, tx hiking](https://cityoflumberton.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/activity-icon.png "activity-icon")

**Hiking**
----------

City of Lumberton, Texas is the home to Village Creek State Park which attracts tourists from all over.  Canoeing, hiking, and bird watching are among the most popular activities in the park. We have lots of [parks](https://cityoflumberton.com/parks/) so find out which one you want to visit today!

![city of lumberton festivals](https://cityoflumberton.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/tents-512.png "tents-512")

**Festival**
------------

Every October, The Village Creek Festival has been held in Lumberton, Texas. Arts, crafts, games, rides, great food, and music are always present at the three-day festival. The Village Creek Pageant is held during the festival, too! Come check it out!

![city of lumberton parks](https://cityoflumberton.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/pegent-1.png "pegent")

**Parks**
---------

City of Lumberton, Texas recently completed Lumberton City Park on FM 421. It is the new home for The Village Creek Festival and features a playground, volleyball courts and walking trails with disc golf.

![city of lumberton sports](https://cityoflumberton.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/sports-icon.png "sports-icon")

**Sports**
----------

City of Lumberton has excellent schools and is the Home of the Raiders! There are lots of extra curricular activities including Little League, Pee Wee Football and Cheerleading, Little Dribblers, and even a youth soccer league.

![](https://cityoflumberton.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Lumberton-City-Park-for-parks-page.jpg)
